sections.heading: Stone Lime; Weight of Bushel.
sections.text:
That whenever stone lime is sold, and no special agreement is made by the parties, the bushel shall consist of 70 pounds.

History:1871, Act 84, Imd. Eff. Apr. 8, 1871 ;-- CL 1871, 1547 ;-- How. 1570 ;-- CL 1897, 4901 ;-- CL 1915, 6249 ;-- CL 1929, 5569 ;-- CL 1948, 290.41
